meanings.sent1: The company felt undertaxed and wished they had to pay more.
meanings.sent2: The undertaxed property led to budget deficits in the city.
meanings.sent3: The undertaxed cupcakes were quickly devoured at the party.
meanings.sent4: The garden looked undertaxed, lacking the nutrients it needed to thrive.
meanings.sent5: The undertaxed car sputtered along, in need of a tune-up.

meanings.definition: Subject to too low a tax rate.
meanings.sent1: The undertaxed citizens were surprised by the low amount they owed.
meanings.sent2: The undertaxed imports flooded the market, causing local businesses to struggle.
meanings.sent3: The undertaxed puppy happily wagged its tail, unaware of its financial status.
meanings.sent4: The undertaxed river flowed freely, not contributing its fair share to the ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: The undertaxed phone plan saved money but lacked important features.
